DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the incidence, long term outcome and factor related to postoperative delirium in elderly patients after non-cardiac surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Incidence, Long- Term Outcome and Factor Related to Non- Cardiac Postoperative Delirium in Elderly Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators have process of quality assurance for the study including data dictionary, data verification of case record form and site monitoring and auditing.
DOC.criteria: Age >/ 60 years American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) physical status 13 Undergoing scheduled surgery Giving an informed consent Impaired visual and auditory disturbance Cannot communicate with Thai language Undergoing neurosurgery
